text: Novy () is a rural locality (a settlement) and the administrative center of Ayryumovskoye Rural Settlement of Giaginsky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 1278 as of 2018. There are 19 streets. == Geography == The village is located at the confluence of the Ayryum river in the Ulka river. == References == Category:Rural localities in Giaginsky District
title: Novy, Giaginsky District, Republic of Adygea
